definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: He used to work in our factory.
We have added two more of the latest assembly lines in our factory.
sentences.chinese: 我們廠子又添設了兩條最先進的生產線。

sentences.english: But factories like this face a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 但是這些廠子也面臨一個挑戰。

sentences.english: She does the least work in this factory.
sentences.chinese: 她在這個廠子幹最少的活。

sentences.english: Some officials will look over our factory this Friday.
sentences.chinese: 本週五一些官員將察看我們的廠子。
他們在新廠子成立了工會。

sentences.english: The Hailin machinery makes the processing for the factory, has the mold, very good dry.
sentences.chinese: 海林機械給廠子裏做加工，有模具，很好乾。

sentences.english: The factory has laid off 40 of its 100 workers.
sentences.chinese: 廠子因此從100名僱員中辭退了40名。
